task.title: Phone Security Code Tutorial
task.shortdesc: This tutorial describes how to set the security code in a Symbian OS device.

context.p: A security code controls access to the phone and can take a number of forms, such as a phone password, or SIM PIN number. Phone security functions use an RMobilePhone::TMobilePhoneSecurityCode flag to specify the type of the code.

step.cmd: To set a security code, use RMobilePhone::ChangeSecurityCode().
step.info: This takes a RMobilePhone::TMobilePhonePasswordChangeV1 object containing the old and new values.

step.cmd: To verify an entered code against the specified stored security code, use RMobilePhone::VerifySecurityCode().
To inform the phone that the user has cancelled a request for a security code to be entered, use RMobilePhone::AbortSecurityCode().
